Trial_Design.evidence: Participants were randomized to receive either mechanically washed allogenic RBCs or standard care RBCs.

Participants.evidence: Cardiac surgery patients at increased risk of large-volume RBC transfusion were eligible.

Intervention.evidence: Participants were randomized to receive either mechanically washed allogenic RBCs or standard care RBCs.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was serum interleukin-8 measured at baseline and at four postsurgery time points.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Sixty adult cardiac surgery patients at three UK cardiac centres were enrolled between September 2013 and March 2015.

Result_Outcome.evidence: There was no difference between groups with respect to perioperative serum interleukin-8 values [adjusted mean difference 0.239 (95% confidence intervals âˆ’0.231, 0.709), P =0.318]
